 1971: %% Check that the printable range set by the user actually works.
 1972: printable_range(Suite) when is_list(Suite) ->
 1973:     {ok, UPeer0, UNode0} = ?CT_PEER(["+pc", "unicode"]),
 1974:     {ok, LPeer0, LNode0} = ?CT_PEER(["+pc", "latin1"]),
 1975:     {ok, DPeer, DNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1976:     unicode = rpc:call(UNode0,io,printable_range,[]),
 1977:     latin1 = rpc:call(LNode0,io,printable_range,[]),
 1978:     latin1 = rpc:call(DNode,io,printable_range,[]),
 1979:     peer:stop(UPeer0),
 1980:     peer:stop(LPeer0),
 1981:     {ok, UPeer, UNode} = ?CT_PEER(["+pcunicode"]),
 1982:     {ok, LPeer, LNode} = ?CT_PEER(["+pclatin1"]),
 1983:     unicode = rpc:call(UNode,io,printable_range,[]),
 1984:     latin1 = rpc:call(LNode,io,printable_range,[]),
 1985:     PrettyOptions = [{column,1},
 1986: 		     {line_length,109},
 1987: 		     {depth,30},
 1988: 		     {line_max_chars,60},
 1989: 		     {record_print_fun,
 1990: 		      fun(_,_) -> no end},
 1991: 		     {encoding,unicode}],
 1992:     PrintableControls = "\t\v\b\f\e\r\n",
 1993: 
 1994:     1025 = print_max(UNode, [{hello, [1024,1025]},
 1995: 			     PrettyOptions]),
 1996:     125 = print_max(LNode,  [{hello, [1024,1025]},
 1997: 			     PrettyOptions]),
 1998:     125 = print_max(DNode,  [{hello, [1024,1025]},
 1999: 			     PrettyOptions]),
 2000:     1025 = print_max(UNode, [{hello, <<1024/utf8,1025/utf8>>},
 2001: 			     PrettyOptions]),
 2002:     125 = print_max(LNode,  [{hello, <<1024/utf8,1025/utf8>>},
 2003: 			     PrettyOptions]),
 2004:     125 = print_max(DNode,  [{hello, <<1024/utf8,1025/utf8>>},
 2005: 			     PrettyOptions]),
 2006:     $v = print_max(UNode, [PrintableControls,PrettyOptions]),
 2007:     $v = print_max(LNode, [PrintableControls,PrettyOptions]),
 2008:     $v = print_max(DNode, [PrintableControls,PrettyOptions]),
 2009:     16#10FFFF = print_max(UNode,
 2010: 			  [<<16#10FFFF/utf8,"\t\v\b\f\e\r\n">>,
 2011: 			   PrettyOptions]),
 2012:     $> = print_max(LNode,
 2013: 		   [<<16#10FFFF/utf8,"\t\v\b\f\e\r\n">>,
 2014: 		    PrettyOptions]),
 2015:     $> = print_max(DNode,
 2016: 		   [<<16#10FFFF/utf8,"\t\v\b\f\e\r\n">>,
 2017: 		    PrettyOptions]),
 2018:     
 2019:     1025 = format_max(UNode, ["~tp", [{hello, [1024,1025]}]]),
 2020:     125 = format_max(LNode,  ["~tp", [{hello, [1024,1025]}]]),
 2021:     125 = format_max(DNode,  ["~tp", [{hello, [1024,1025]}]]),
 2022:     1025 = format_max(UNode, ["~tp", [{hello, <<1024/utf8,1025/utf8>>}]]),
 2023:     125 = format_max(LNode,  ["~tp", [{hello, <<1024/utf8,1025/utf8>>}]]),
 2024:     125 = format_max(DNode,  ["~tp", [{hello, <<1024/utf8,1025/utf8>>}]]),
 2025: 
 2026:     $\e = format_max(UNode, ["~ts", [PrintableControls]]),
 2027:     $\e = format_max(LNode, ["~ts", [PrintableControls]]),
 2028:     $\e = format_max(DNode, ["~ts", [PrintableControls]]),
 2029: 
 2030:     peer:stop(UPeer),
 2031:     peer:stop(LPeer),
 2032:     peer:stop(DPeer),
 2033:     ok.
 2034: 
 2035: print_max(Node, Args) ->
 2036:     rpc_call_max(Node, io_lib_pretty, print, Args).
 2037: 
 2038: format_max(Node, Args) ->
 2039:     rpc_call_max(Node, io_lib, format, Args).
 2040: 
 2041: rpc_call_max(Node, M, F, Args) ->
 2042:     lists:max(lists:flatten(rpc:call(Node, M, F, Args))).
 2043: 
 2044: %% Make sure that a bad specification for a printable range is rejected.
 2045: bad_printable_range(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2046:     Cmd = ct:get_progname() ++ " +pcunnnnnicode -run erlang halt",
 2047:     P = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stderr_to_stdout, {line, 200}]),
 2048:     ok = receive
 2049:              {P, {data, {eol , "bad range of printable characters" ++ _}}} ->
 2050:                  ok;
 2051:              Other ->
 2052:                  Other
 2053:          %% valgrind needs a lot of time
 2054:          after 6000 ->
 2055:                    timeout
 2056:          end,
 2057:     catch port_close(P),
 2058:     flush_from_port(P),
 2059:     ok.
 2060: 
 2061: flush_from_port(P) ->
 2062:     receive {P, _} ->
 2063: 	    flush_from_port(P)
 2064:     after 0 ->
 2065: 	    ok
 2066:     end.
 2067: 
 2068: %% Test binaries printed with a depth of one behave correctly.
 2069: io_lib_print_binary_depth_one(Suite) when is_list(Suite) ->
 2070:     "<<>>" = fmt("~W", [<<>>, 1]),
 2071:     "<<>>" = fmt("~P", [<<>>, 1]),
 2072:     "<<...>>" = fmt("~W", [<<1>>, 1]),
 2073:     "<<...>>" = fmt("~P", [<<1>>, 1]),
 2074:     "<<...>>" = fmt("~W", [<<1:7>>, 1]),
 2075:     "<<...>>" = fmt("~P", [<<1:7>>, 1]),
 2076:     ok.
 2077: 
 2078: %% OTP-10302. Unicode.
 2079: otp_10302(Suite) when is_list(Suite) ->
 2080:     {ok, UPeer, UNode} = ?CT_PEER(["+pc", "unicode"]),
 2081:     {ok, LPeer, LNode} = ?CT_PEER(["+pc", "latin1"]),
 2082:     "\"\x{400}\"" = rpc:call(UNode,?MODULE,pretty,["\x{400}", -1]),
 2083:     "<<\"\x{400}\"/utf8>>" = rpc:call(UNode,?MODULE,pretty,
 2084: 				      [<<"\x{400}"/utf8>>, -1]),
 2085: 
 2086:     "<<\"\x{400}foo\"/utf8>>" = rpc:call(UNode,?MODULE,pretty,
 2087: 					 [<<"\x{400}foo"/utf8>>, 2]),
 2088:     "[1024]" = rpc:call(LNode,?MODULE,pretty,["\x{400}", -1]),
 2089:     "<<208,128>>" = rpc:call(LNode,?MODULE,pretty,[<<"\x{400}"/utf8>>, -1]),
 2090: 
 2091:     "<<208,...>>" = rpc:call(LNode,?MODULE,pretty,[<<"\x{400}foo"/utf8>>, 2]),
 2092:     peer:stop(UPeer),
 2093:     peer:stop(LPeer),
 2094: 
 2095:     "<<\"Ã¤ppl\"/utf8>>" = pretty(<<"Ã¤ppl"/utf8>>, 2),
 2096:     "<<\"Ã¤ppl\"/utf8...>>" = pretty(<<"Ã¤pple"/utf8>>, 2),
 2097:     "<<\"apel\">>" = pretty(<<"apel">>, 2),
 2098:     "<<\"apel\"...>>" = pretty(<<"apelsin">>, 2),
 2099:     "<<\"Ã¤ppl\">>" = fmt("~tp", [<<"Ã¤ppl">>]),
 2100:     "<<\"Ã¤ppl\"...>>" = fmt("~tP", [<<"Ã¤pple">>, 2]),
 2101:     "<<0,0,0,0,0,0,1,0>>" = fmt("~p", [<<256:64/unsigned-integer>>]),
 2102:     "<<0,0,0,0,0,0,1,0>>" = fmt("~tp", [<<256:64/unsigned-integer>>]),
 2103: 
 2104:     Chars = lists:seq(0, 512), % just a few...
 2105:     [] = [C || C <- Chars, S <- io_lib:write_char_as_latin1(C),
 2106:                not is_latin1(S)],
 2107:     L1 = [S || C <- Chars, S <- io_lib:write_char(C),
 2108:                not is_latin1(S)],
 2109:     L1 = lists:seq(256, 512),
 2110: 
 2111:     [] = [C || C <- Chars, S <- io_lib:write_string_as_latin1([C]),
 2112:                not is_latin1(S)],
 2113:     L2 = [S || C <- Chars, S <- io_lib:write_string([C]),
 2114:                not is_latin1(S)],
 2115:     L2 = lists:seq(256, 512),
 2116: 
 2117:     ok.
 2118: 
 2119: pretty(Term, Depth) when is_integer(Depth) ->
 2120:     Opts = [{column, 1}, {line_length, 20},
 2121:             {depth, Depth}, {line_max_chars, 60},
 2122:             {record_print_fun, fun rfd/2},
 2123:             {encoding, unicode}],
 2124:     pretty(Term, Opts);
 2125: pretty(Term, Opts) when is_list(Opts) ->
 2126:     R = io_lib_pretty:print(Term, Opts),
 2127:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~ts", [R])).
 2128: 
 2129: is_latin1(S) ->
 2130:     S >= 0 andalso S =< 255.
 2131: 
 2132: %% OTP-10836. ~ts extended to latin1.
 2133: otp_10836(Suite) when is_list(Suite) ->
 2134:     S = io_lib:format("~ts", [[<<"Ã¤pple"/utf8>>, <<"Ã¤pple">>]]),
 2135:     "Ã¤ppleÃ¤pple" = lists:flatten(S),
 2136:     ok.
 2137: 
 2138: %% OTP-10755. The 'l' modifier
 2139: otp_10755(Suite) when is_list(Suite) ->
 2140:     %% printing plain ascii characters
 2141:     S = "string",
 2142:     "\"string\"" = fmt("~p", [S]),
 2143:     "[115,116,114,105,110,103]" = fmt("~lp", [S]),
 2144:     "\"string\"" = fmt("~P", [S, 2]),
 2145:     "[115|...]" = fmt("~lP", [S, 2]),
 2146:     %% printing latin1 chars, with and without modifiers
 2147:     T = {[255],list_to_atom([255]),[a,b,c]},
 2148:     "{\"Ã¿\",Ã¿,[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~p", [T]),
 2149:     "{\"Ã¿\",Ã¿,[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~tp", [T]),
 2150:     "{[255],Ã¿,[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~lp", [T]),
 2151:     "{[255],Ã¿,[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~ltp", [T]),
 2152:     "{[255],Ã¿,[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~tlp", [T]),
 2153:     "{\"Ã¿\",Ã¿,...}" = fmt("~P", [T,3]),
 2154:     "{\"Ã¿\",Ã¿,...}" = fmt("~tP", [T,3]),
 2155:     "{[255],Ã¿,...}" = fmt("~lP", [T,3]),
 2156:     "{[255],Ã¿,...}" = fmt("~ltP", [T,3]),
 2157:     "{[255],Ã¿,...}" = fmt("~tlP", [T,3]),
 2158:     %% printing unicode chars, with and without modifiers
 2159:     U = {[666],list_to_atom([666]),[a,b,c]},
 2160:     "{[666],'\\x{29A}',[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~p", [U]),
 2161:     case io:printable_range() of
 2162:         unicode ->
 2163:             "{\"Ê\",'Ê',[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~tp", [U]),
 2164:             "{\"Ê\",'Ê',...}" = fmt("~tP", [U,3]);
 2165:         latin1 ->
 2166:             "{[666],'Ê',[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~tp", [U]),
 2167:             "{[666],'Ê',...}" = fmt("~tP", [U,3])
 2168:     end,
 2169:     "{[666],'\\x{29A}',[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~lp", [U]),
 2170:     "{[666],'Ê',[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~ltp", [U]),
 2171:     "{[666],'Ê',[a,b,c]}" = fmt("~tlp", [U]),
 2172:     "{[666],'\\x{29A}',...}" = fmt("~P", [U,3]),
 2173:     "{[666],'\\x{29A}',...}" = fmt("~lP", [U,3]),
 2174:     "{[666],'Ê',...}" = fmt("~ltP", [U,3]),
 2175:     "{[666],'Ê',...}" = fmt("~tlP", [U,3]),
 2176:     %% the compiler should catch uses of ~l with other than pP
 2177:     Text =
 2178:         "-module(l_mod).\n"
 2179:         "-export([t/0]).\n"
 2180:         "t() ->\n"
 2181:         "    S = \"string\",\n"
 2182:         "    io:format(\"~lw\", [S]),\n"
 2183:         "    io:format(\"~lW\", [S, 1]),\n"
 2184:         "    io:format(\"~ltw\", [S]),\n"
 2185:         "    io:format(\"~tlw\", [S]),\n"
 2186:         "    io:format(\"~ltW\", [S, 1]),\n"
 2187:         "    io:format(\"~tlW\", [S, 1]).\n",
 2188:     {ok,l_mod,[{_File,Ws}]} = compile_file("l_mod.erl", Text, Suite),
 2189:     ["format string invalid (invalid control ~lw)",
 2190:      "format string invalid (invalid control ~lW)",
 2191:      "format string invalid (invalid control ~ltw)",
 2192:      "format string invalid (invalid control ~ltw)",
 2193:      "format string invalid (invalid control ~ltW)",
 2194:      "format string invalid (invalid control ~ltW)"] =
 2195:         [lists:flatten(M:format_error(E)) || {_L,M,E} <- Ws],
 2196:     ok.
 2197: 
 2198: compile_file(File, Text, Config) ->
 2199:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Config),
 2200:     Fname = filename:join(PrivDir, File),
 2201:     ok = file:write_file(Fname, Text),
 2202:     try compile:file(Fname, [return])
 2203:     after ok %file:delete(Fname)
 2204:     end.
 2205: 
 2206: io_lib_width_too_small(_Config) ->
 2207:     "**" = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~2.3w", [3.14])),
 2208:     "**" = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~2.5w", [3.14])),
 2209:     ok.
 2210: 
 2211: %% Test that the time for a huge message queue is not
 2212: %% significantly slower than with an empty message queue.
 2213: io_with_huge_message_queue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2214:     case test_server:is_cover() of
 2215: 	true ->
 2216: 	    {skip,"Running under cover"};
 2217: 	false ->
 2218: 	    do_io_with_huge_message_queue(Config)
 2219:     end.
 2220: 
 2221: do_io_with_huge_message_queue(Config) ->
 2222:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Config),
 2223:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, "slask"),
 2224:     {ok, F1} = file:open(File, [write]),
 2225:     Test = fun(Times) ->
 2226: 		   {Time,ok} = timer:tc(fun() -> writes(Times, F1) end),
 2227: 		   Time
 2228: 	   end,
 2229:     {Times,EmptyTime} = calibrate(100, Test),
 2230: 
 2231:     [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 500000)],
 2232:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2233:     FullTime = Test(Times),
 2234:     file:close(F1),
 2235:     file:delete(File),
 2236:     io:format("Number of writes: ~p", [Times]),
 2237:     io:format("Time for empty message queue: ~p", [EmptyTime]),
 2238:     io:format("Time for huge message queue: ~p", [FullTime]),
 2239: 
 2240:     case (FullTime+1) / (EmptyTime+1) of
 2241: 	Q when Q < 10 ->
 2242: 	    ok;
 2243: 	Q ->
 2244: 	    io:format("Q = ~p", [Q]),
 2245: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2246:     end,
 2247:     ok.
 2248: 
 2249: %% Make sure that the time is not too short. That could cause the
 2250: %% test case to fail.
 2251: calibrate(N, Test) when N =< 100000 ->
 2252:     case Test(N) of
 2253: 	Time when Time < 50000 ->
 2254: 	    calibrate(10*N, Test);
 2255: 	Time ->
 2256: 	    {N,Time}
 2257:     end;
 2258: calibrate(N, _) ->
 2259:     N.
 2260: 
 2261: writes(0, _) -> ok;
 2262: writes(N, F1) ->
 2263:     file:write(F1, "hello\n"),
 2264:     writes(N - 1, F1).
 2265: 
 2266: format_string(_Config) ->
 2267:     %% All but padding is tested by fmt/2.
 2268:     "xxxxxxxsss" = fmt("~10..xs", ["sss"]),
 2269:     "xxxxxxsssx" = fmt("~10.4.xs", ["sss"]),
 2270:     "xxxxxxsssx" = fmt("~10.4.*s", [$x, "sss"]),
 2271:     ok.
 2272: 
 2273: maps(_Config) ->
 2274:     %% Note that order in which a map is printed is arbitrary.  In
 2275:     %% practice, small maps (non-HAMT) are printed in key order, but
 2276:     %% the breakpoint for creating big maps (HAMT) is lower in the
 2277:     %% debug-compiled run-time system than in the optimized run-time
 2278:     %% system.
 2279:     %%
 2280:     %% Therefore, play it completely safe by not assuming any order
 2281:     %% in a map with more than one element.
 2282: 
 2283:     "#{}" = fmt("~w", [#{}]),
 2284:     "#{a => b}" = fmt("~w", [#{a=>b}]),
 2285:     re_fmt(<<"#\\{(a => b),[.][.][.]\\}">>,
 2286: 	     "~W", [#{a => b,c => d},2]),
 2287:     re_fmt(<<"#\\{(a => b),[.][.][.]\\}">>,
 2288: 	   "~W", [#{a => b,c => d,e => f},2]),
 2289: 
 2290:     "#{}" = fmt("~p", [#{}]),
 2291:     "#{a => b}" = fmt("~p", [#{a => b}]),
 2292:     "#{...}" = fmt("~P", [#{a => b},1]),
 2293:     re_fmt(<<"#\\{(a => b|c => d),[.][.][.]\\}">>,
 2294: 	   "~P", [#{a => b,c => d},2]),
 2295:     re_fmt(<<"#\\{(a => b|c => d|e => f),[.][.][.]\\}">>,
 2296: 	   "~P", [#{a => b,c => d,e => f},2]),
 2297: 
 2298:     List = [{I,I*I} || I <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
 2299:     Map = maps:from_list(List),
 2300: 
 2301:     "#{...}" = fmt("~P", [Map,1]),
 2302: 
 2303:     %% Print a map and parse it back to a map.
 2304:     S = fmt("~p\n", [Map]),
 2305:     io:format("~p\n", [S]),
 2306:     Map = parse_map(S),
 2307: 
 2308:     %% Smoke test of a map as key.
 2309:     MapAsKey = #{Map => "value"},
 2310:     io:format("~s\n", [fmt("~p", [MapAsKey])]),
 2311:     ok.
 2312: 
 2313: re_fmt(Pattern, Format, Args) ->
 2314:     S = list_to_binary(fmt(Format, Args)),
 2315:     case re:run(S, Pattern, [{capture,none}]) of
 2316: 	nomatch ->
 2317: 	    io:format("Pattern: ~s", [Pattern]),
 2318: 	    io:format("Result:  ~s", [S]),
 2319: 	    ct:fail(failed);
 2320: 	match ->
 2321: 	    ok
 2322:     end.
 2323: 
 2324: %% Parse a map consisting of integer keys and values.
 2325: parse_map(S0) ->
 2326:     S1 = parse_expect(S0, "#{"),
 2327:     {M,S2} = parse_map_1(S1),
 2328:     S = parse_expect(S2, "}"),
 2329:     S = "",
 2330:     M.
 2331: 
 2332: parse_map_1(S0) ->
 2333:     {Key,S1} = parse_number(S0),
 2334:     S2 = parse_expect(S1, "=>"),
 2335:     {Val,S3} = parse_number(S2),
 2336:     case S3 of
 2337: 	","++S4 ->
 2338: 	    S5 = parse_skip_ws(S4),
 2339: 	    {Map,S} = parse_map_1(S5),
 2340: 	    {Map#{Key=>Val},S};
 2341: 	S ->
 2342: 	    {#{Key=>Val},S}
 2343:     end.
 2344: 
 2345: parse_number(S) ->
 2346:     parse_number(S, none).
 2347: 
 2348: parse_number([C|S], Acc0) when $0 =< C, C =< $9 ->
 2349:     Acc = case Acc0 of
 2350: 	      none -> 0;
 2351: 	      _ when is_integer(Acc0) -> Acc0
 2352: 	  end,
 2353:     parse_number(S, Acc*10+C-$0);
 2354: parse_number(S, Acc) ->
 2355:     {Acc,parse_skip_ws(S)}.
 2356: 
 2357: parse_expect([H|T1], [H|T2]) ->
 2358:     parse_expect(T1, T2);
 2359: parse_expect(S, []) ->
 2360:     parse_skip_ws(S).
 2361: 
 2362: parse_skip_ws([C|S]) when C =< $\s ->
 2363:     parse_skip_ws(S);
 2364: parse_skip_ws(S) ->
 2365:     S.
 2366: 
 2367: %% Cover the last uncovered lines for completeness.
 2368: coverage(_Config) ->
 2369:     S1 = io_lib_pretty:print({a,term}, fun(_, _) -> no end),
 2370:     io:format("~s\n", [S1]),
 2371: 
 2372:     %% The tuple of arity three will be ignored.
 2373:     S2 = io_lib_pretty:print(lists:seq(1, 100), [{depth,1,1}]),
 2374:     io:format("~s\n", [S2]),
 2375: 
 2376:     ok.
 2377: 
 2378: %% Test UTF-8 atoms.
 2379: otp_14178_unicode_atoms(_Config) ->
 2380:     "atom" = fmt("~ts", ['atom']),
 2381:     "ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼" = fmt("~ts", ['ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼']),
 2382:     [16#10FFFF] = fmt("~ts", ['\x{10FFFF}']),
 2383: 
 2384:     %% ~s must not accept code points greater than 255.
 2385:     bad_io_lib_format("~s", ['\x{100}']),
 2386:     bad_io_lib_format("~s", ['ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼']),
 2387: 
 2388:     ok.
 2389: 
 2390: bad_io_lib_format(F, S) ->
 2391:     try io_lib:format(F, S) of
 2392:         _ ->
 2393:             ct:fail({should_fail,F,S})
 2394:     catch
 2395:         error:badarg ->
 2396:             ok
 2397:     end.
 2398:

 2400:     "..." = p(#{}, 0),

 2520:        "        f2 = b},\n"
 2521:        "      f2 = b},\n"
 2522:        "    f2 = b}}", p(M5, -1)),
 2523:     ok.
 2524: 
 2525: %% Just check number of newlines and dots ('...').
 2526: -define(WEAK, true).
 2527: 
 2528: -ifdef(WEAK).
 2529: 
 2530: weak(S, R) ->
 2531:     (nl(S) =:= nl(R) andalso
 2532:      dots(S) =:= dots(S)).
 2533: 
 2534: nl(S) ->
 2535:     [C || C <- S, C =:= $\n].
 2536: 
 2537: dots(S) ->
 2538:     [C || C <- S, C =:= $\.].
 2539: 
 2540: -else. % WEAK
 2541: 
 2542: weak(S, R) ->
 2543:     mt(S, R).
 2544: 
 2545: -endif. % WEAK
 2546: 
 2547: %% If EXACT is defined: mt() matches strings exactly.
 2548: %%
 2549: %% if EXACT is not defined: do not match the strings exactly, but
 2550: %% compare them assuming that all map keys and all map values are
 2551: %% equal (by assuming all map keys and all map values have the same
 2552: %% length and begin with $k and $v respectively).
 2553: 
 2554: %-define(EXACT, true).
 2555: 
 2556: -ifdef(EXACT).
 2557: 
 2558: mt(S, R) ->
 2559:     S =:= R.
 2560: 
 2561: -else. % EXACT
 2562: 
 2563: mt(S, R) ->
 2564:     anon(S) =:= anon(R).
 2565: 
 2566: anon(S) ->
 2567:     {ok, Ts0, _} = erl_scan:string(S, 1, [text]),
 2568:     Ts = anon1(Ts0),
 2569:     text(Ts).
 2570: 
 2571: anon1([]) -> [];
 2572: anon1([{atom,Anno,Atom}=T|Ts]) ->
 2573:     case erl_anno:text(Anno) of
 2574:         "k" ++ _ ->
 2575:             NewAnno = erl_anno:set_text("key", Anno),
 2576:             [{atom,NewAnno,Atom}|anon1(Ts)];
 2577:         "v" ++ _ ->
 2578:             NewAnno = erl_anno:set_text("val", Anno),
 2579:             [{atom,NewAnno,Atom}|anon1(Ts)];
 2580:         _ ->
 2581:             [T|anon1(Ts)]
 2582:     end;
 2583: anon1([T|Ts]) ->
 2584:     [T|anon1(Ts)].
 2585: 
 2586: text(Ts) ->
 2587:     lists:append(text1(Ts)).
 2588: 
 2589: text1([]) -> [];
 2590: text1([T|Ts]) ->
 2591:     Anno = element(2, T),
 2592:     [erl_anno:text(Anno) | text1(Ts)].
 2593: 
 2594: -endif. % EXACT
 2595: 
 2596: otp_14285(_Config) ->
 2597:     UOpts = [{record_print_fun, fun rfd/2},
 2598:              {encoding, unicode}],
 2599:     LOpts = [{record_print_fun, fun rfd/2},
 2600:              {encoding, latin1}],
 2601: 
 2602:     RT = {'\x{400}','\x{400}'},
 2603:     "#'\x{400}'{'\x{400}' = '\x{400}'}" = pretty(RT, UOpts),
 2604:     "#'\\x{400}'{'\\x{400}' = '\\x{400}'}" = pretty(RT, LOpts),
 2605: 
 2606:     Chars = lists:seq(0, 512),
 2607:     [] = [C ||
 2608:              C <- Chars,
 2609:              S <- io_lib:write_atom_as_latin1(list_to_atom([C])),
 2610:              not is_latin1(S)],
 2611:     L1 = [S || C <- Chars, S <- io_lib:write_atom(list_to_atom([C])),
 2612:                not is_latin1(S)],
 2613:     L1 = lists:seq(256, 512),
 2614: 
 2615:     latin1_fmt("~w", ['ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼']),
 2616:     latin1_fmt("~w", ['\x{10FFFF}']),
 2617:     "'ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼'" = fmt("~tw", ['ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼']),
 2618:     [$',16#10FFFF,$'] = fmt("~tw", ['\x{10FFFF}']),
 2619: 
 2620:     latin1_fmt("~W", ['ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼', 13]),
 2621:     latin1_fmt("~W", ['\x{10FFFF}', 13]),
 2622:     "'ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼'" = fmt("~tW", ['ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼', 13]),
 2623:     [$',16#10FFFF,$'] = fmt("~tW", ['\x{10FFFF}', 13]),
 2624: 
 2625:     {ok, [an_atom],[]} = io_lib:fread("~a", "an_atom"),
 2626:     {ok, [an_atom],[]} = io_lib:fread("~ta", "an_atom"),
 2627:     Str = "\"ab" ++ [1089] ++ "cd\"",
 2628:     {ok, ["\"ab"], [1089]++"cd\""} = io_lib:fread("~s", Str),
 2629:     {ok, ['\"ab'], [1089]++"cd\""} = io_lib:fread("~a", Str),
 2630:     {ok,[Str], []} = io_lib:fread("~ts", Str),
 2631:     {ok,[Atom],[]} = io_lib:fread("~ta", Str),
 2632:     Str = atom_to_list(Atom),
 2633: 
 2634:     ok.
 2635: 
 2636: latin1_fmt(Fmt, Args) ->
 2637:     L = fmt(Fmt, Args),
 2638:     true = lists:all(fun is_latin1/1, L).
 2639: 
 2640: limit_term(_Config) ->
 2641:     {_, 2} = limt([a,b,c], 2),
 2642:     {_, 2} = limt([a,b,c], 3),
 2643:     {_, 2} = limt([a,b|c], 2),
 2644:     {_, 2} = limt([a,b|c], 3),
 2645:     {_, 2} = limt({a,b,c,[d,e]}, 2),
 2646:     {_, 2} = limt({a,b,c,[d,e]}, 3),
 2647:     {_, 2} = limt({a,b,c,[d,e]}, 4),
 2648:     T0 = [1|{a,b,c}],
 2649:     {_, 2} = limt(T0, 2),
 2650:     {_, 2} = limt(T0, 3),
 2651:     {_, 2} = limt(T0, 4),
 2652:     {_, 1} = limt(<<"foo">>, 18),
 2653:     {_, 2} = limt({"",[1,2]}, 3),
 2654:     {_, 2} = limt({"",{1,2}}, 3),
 2655:     true = limt_pp({"123456789012345678901234567890",{1,2}}, 3),
 2656:     ok = blimt(<<"123456789012345678901234567890">>),
 2657:     true = limt_pp(<<"123456789012345678901234567890">>, 3),
 2658:     {_, 2} = limt({<<"kljlkjsl">>,[1,2,3,4]}, 4),
 2659:     {_, 1} = limt(<<7:3>>, 2),
 2660:     {_, 1} = limt(<<7:21>>, 2),
 2661:     {_, 1} = limt([], 2),
 2662:     {_, 1} = limt({}, 2),
 2663:     {_, 1} = limt({"", ""}, 4),
 2664:     {_, 1} = limt(#{}, 2),
 2665:     {_, 2} = limt(#{[] => {}}, 1),
 2666:     {_, 2} = limt(#{[] => {}}, 2),
 2667:     {_, 1} = limt(#{[] => {}}, 3),
 2668:     T = #{[] => {},[a] => [b]},
 2669:     {_, 1} = limt(T, 0),
 2670:     {_, 2} = limt(T, 1),
 2671:     {_, 2} = limt(T, 2),
 2672:     {_, 2} = limt(T, 3),
 2673:     {_, 1} = limt(T, 4),
 2674:     T2 = #{[] => {},{} => []},
 2675:     {_, 2} = limt(T2, 1),
 2676:     {_, 2} = limt(T2, 2),
 2677:     {_, 1} = limt(T2, 3),
 2678:     ok.
 2679: 
 2680: blimt(Binary) ->
 2681:     blimt(Binary, byte_size(Binary)).
 2682: 
 2683: blimt(_B, 1) -> ok;
 2684: blimt(B, D) ->
 2685:     {_, 1} = limt(B, D),
 2686:     blimt(B, D - 1).
 2687: 
 2688: limt(Term, Depth) when is_integer(Depth) ->
 2689:     T1 = io_lib:limit_term(Term, Depth),
 2690:     S = form(Term, Depth),
 2691:     S1 = form(T1, Depth),
 2692:     OK1 = S1 =:= S,
 2693: 
 2694:     T2 = io_lib:limit_term(Term, Depth+1),
 2695:     S2 = form(T2, Depth),
 2696:     OK2 = S2 =:= S,
 2697: 
 2698:     T3 = io_lib:limit_term(Term, Depth-1),
 2699:     S3 = form(T3, Depth),
 2700:     OK3 = S3 =/= S,
 2701: 
 2702:     R = case {OK1, OK2, OK3} of
 2703:             {true, true, true} -> 2;
 2704:             {true, true, false} -> 1;
 2705:             _ -> 0
 2706:         end,
 2707:     {{S, S1, S2}, R}.
 2708: 
 2709: form(Term, Depth) ->
 2710:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~W", [Term, Depth])).
 2711: 
 2712: limt_pp(Term, Depth) when is_integer(Depth) ->
 2713:     T1 = io_lib:limit_term(Term, Depth),
 2714:     S = pp(Term, Depth),
 2715:     S1 = pp(T1, Depth),
 2716:     S1 =:= S.
 2717: 
 2718: pp(Term, Depth) ->
 2719:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~P", [Term, Depth])).
 2720: 
 2721: otp_14983(_Config) ->
 2722:     trunc_depth(-1, fun trp/3),
 2723:     trunc_depth(10, fun trp/3),
 2724:     trunc_depth(-1, fun trw/3),
 2725:     trunc_depth(10, fun trw/3),
 2726:     trunc_depth_p(-1),
 2727:     trunc_depth_p(10),
 2728:     trunc_string(),
 2729:     ok.
 2730: 
 2731: trunc_string() ->
 2732:     "str " = trf("str ", [], 10),
 2733:     "str str" = trf("str ~s", ["str"], 6),
 2734:     "str ..." = trf("str ~s", ["str1"], 6),
 2735:     "str str" = trf("str ~s", ["str"], 7),
 2736:     "str str" = trf("str ~8s", ["str"], 6),
 2737:     "str ..." = trf("str ~8s", ["str1"], 6),
 2738:     {ok, UPeer, UNode} = ?CT_PEER(["+pc", "unicode"]),
 2739:     U = "ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼",
 2740:     UFun = fun(Format, Args, CharsLimit) ->
 2741:                    rpc:call(UNode,
 2742:                             ?MODULE, trf, [Format, Args, CharsLimit])
 2743:            end,
 2744:     "str ÐºÐ¸Ñ" = UFun("str ~3ts", [U], 7),
 2745:     "str ..." = UFun("str ~3ts", [U], 6),
 2746:     "str ..." = UFun("str ~30ts", [U], 6),
 2747:     "str ÐºÐ¸Ñ..." = UFun("str ~30ts", [U], 10),
 2748:     "str ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»..." = UFun("str ~30ts", [U], 13),
 2749:     "str ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸Ì..." = UFun("str ~30ts", [U], 14),
 2750:     "str ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑ..." = UFun("str ~30ts", [U], 15),
 2751:     "\"ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐº\"..." = UFun("~tp", [U], 13),
 2752:     BU = <<"ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð¼"/utf8>>,
 2753:     "<<\"ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸Ì\"/utf8...>>" = UFun("~tp", [BU], 20),
 2754:     "<<\"ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸Ì\"/utf8...>>" = UFun("~tp", [BU], 21),
 2755:     "<<\"ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑÐº\"/utf8...>>" = UFun("~tp", [BU], 22),
 2756:     peer:stop(UPeer).
 2757: 
 2758: trunc_depth(D, Fun) ->
 2759:     "..." = Fun("", D, 0),
 2760:     "[]" = Fun("", D, 1),
 2761: 
 2762:     "#{}" = Fun(#{}, D, 1),
 2763:     "#{a => 1}" = Fun(#{a => 1}, D, 7),
 2764:     "#{...}" = Fun(#{a => 1}, D, 5),
 2765:     "#{a => 1}" = Fun(#{a => 1}, D, 6),
 2766:     A = lists:seq(1, 1000),
 2767:     M = #{A => A, {A,A} => {A,A}},
 2768:     "#{...}" = Fun(M, D, 6),
 2769:     "#{{...} => {...},...}" = Fun(M, D, 7),
 2770:     "#{{[...],...} => {[...],...},...}" = Fun(M, D, 22),
 2771:     "#{{[...],...} => {[...],...},[...] => [...]}" = Fun(M, D, 31),
 2772:     "#{{[...],...} => {[...],...},[1|...] => [...]}" = Fun(M, D, 33),
 2773:     "#{{[1|...],[...]} => {[1|...],[...]},[1,2|...] => [...]}" =
 2774:         Fun(M, D, 50),
 2775: 
 2776:     "..." = Fun({c, 1, 2}, D, 0),
 2777:     "{...}" = Fun({c, 1, 2}, D, 1),
 2778: 
 2779:     "..." = Fun({}, D, 0),
 2780:     "{}" = Fun({}, D, 1),
 2781:     T = {A, A, A},
 2782:     "{...}" = Fun(T, D, 5),
 2783:     "{[...],...}" = Fun(T, D, 6),
 2784:     "{[1|...],[...],...}" = Fun(T, D, 12),
 2785:     "{[1,2|...],[1|...],...}" = Fun(T, D, 20),
 2786:     "{[1,2|...],[1|...],[...]}" = Fun(T, D, 21),
 2787:     "{[1,2,3|...],[1,2|...],[1|...]}" = Fun(T, D, 28),
 2788: 
 2789:     "{[1],[1,2|...]}" = Fun({[1],[1,2,3,4]}, D, 14).
 2790: 
 2791: trunc_depth_p(D) ->
 2792:     UOpts = [{record_print_fun, fun rfd/2},
 2793:              {encoding, unicode}],
 2794:     LOpts = [{record_print_fun, fun rfd/2},
 2795:              {encoding, latin1}],
 2796:     trunc_depth_p(D, UOpts),
 2797:     trunc_depth_p(D, LOpts).
 2798: 
 2799: trunc_depth_p(D, Opts) ->
 2800:     "[...]" = trp("abcdefg", D, 4, Opts),
 2801:     "\"abc\"..." = trp("abcdefg", D, 5, Opts),
 2802:     "\"abcdef\"..." = trp("abcdefg", D, 8, Opts),
 2803:     "\"abcdefg\"" = trp("abcdefg", D, 9, Opts),
 2804:     "\"abcdefghijkl\"" = trp("abcdefghijkl", D, -1, Opts),
 2805:     AZ = lists:seq($A, $Z),
 2806:     AZb = list_to_binary(AZ),
 2807:     AZbS = "<<\"" ++ AZ ++ "\">>",
 2808:     AZbS = trp(AZb, D, -1),
 2809:     "<<\"ABCDEFGH\"...>>" = trp(AZb, D, 17, Opts), % 4 chars even if D = -1...
 2810:     "<<\"ABCDEFGHIJKL\"...>>" = trp(AZb, D, 18, Opts),
 2811:     B1 = <<"abcdef",0:8>>,
 2812:     "<<\"ab\"...>>" = trp(B1, D, 8, Opts),
 2813:     "<<\"abcdef\"...>>" = trp(B1, D, 14, Opts),
 2814:     "<<97,98,99,100,...>>" = trp(B1, D, 16, Opts),
 2815:     "<<97,98,99,100,101,102,0>>" = trp(B1, D, -1, Opts),
 2816:     B2 = <<AZb/binary,0:8>>,
 2817:     "<<\"AB\"...>>" = trp(B2, D, 8, Opts),
 2818:     "<<\"ABCDEFGH\"...>>" = trp(B2, D, 14, Opts),
 2819:     "<<65,66,67,68,69,70,71,72,0>>" = trp(<<"ABCDEFGH",0:8>>, D, -1, Opts),
 2820:     "<<97,0,107,108,...>>" = trp(<<"a",0:8,"kllkjlksdjfsj">>, D, 20, Opts),
 2821: 
 2822:     A = lists:seq(1, 1000),
 2823:     "#c{...}" = trp({c, 1, 2}, D, 6),
 2824:     "#c{...}" = trp({c, 1, 2}, D, 7),
 2825:     "#c{f1 = [...],...}" = trp({c, A, A}, D, 18),
 2826:     "#c{f1 = [1|...],f2 = [...]}" = trp({c, A, A}, D, 19),
 2827:     "#c{f1 = [1,2|...],f2 = [1|...]}" = trp({c, A, A}, D, 31),
 2828:     "#c{f1 = [1,2,3|...],f2 = [1,2|...]}" = trp({c, A, A}, D, 32).
 2829: 
 2830: trp(Term, D, T) ->
 2831:     trp(Term, D, T, [{record_print_fun, fun rfd/2}]).
 2832: 
 2833: trp(Term, D, T, Opts) ->
 2834:     R = io_lib_pretty:print(Term, [{depth, D},
 2835:                                    {chars_limit, T}|Opts]),
 2836:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~s", [R])).
 2837: 
 2838: trw(Term, D, T) ->
 2839:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~W", [Term, D], [{chars_limit, T}])).
 2840: 
 2841: trf(Format, Args, T) ->
 2842:     trf(Format, Args, T, [{record_print_fun, fun rfd/2}]).
 2843: 
 2844: trf(Format, Args, T, Opts) ->
 2845:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format(Format, Args, [{chars_limit, T}|Opts])).

 2933:     "|ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð»Ð¸ÌÑÐµÑ|" = trf("|~10ts|", [U], -1),
 2934:     ok.

 2948: github_4801(_Config) ->

 2950: 
 2951: %% GH-4824, GH-4842, OTP-17459.
 2952: chars_limit(_Config) ->
 2953:     List = fun R(I) ->
 2954:                    case I =:= 0 of true -> 0; false -> [I, R(I-1)] end
 2955:            end,
 2956:     Tuple = fun R(I) ->
 2957:                    case I =:= 0 of true -> 0; false -> {I, R(I-1)} end
 2958:            end,
 2959:     Map = fun R(I) ->
 2960:                    case I =:= 0 of true -> 0; false -> #{I => R(I-1)} end
 2961:            end,
 2962:     Record = fun R(I) ->
 2963:                    case I =:= 0 of true -> 0; false -> {b, R(I-1)} end
 2964:            end,
 2965:     Test = fun (F, N, Lim) ->
 2966:                    Opts = [{chars_limit, Lim},
 2967:                            {record_print_fun, fun rfd/2}],
 2968:                    [_|_] = io_lib_pretty:print(F(N), Opts)
 2969:            end,
 2970:     %% Used to loop:
 2971:     Test(List, 1000, 1000),
 2972:     Test(Tuple, 1000, 1000),
 2973:     Test(Map, 1000, 1000),
 2974:     Test(Record, 1000, 1000),
 2975: 
 2976:     %% Misc sizes and char limits:
 2977:     _ = [Test(What, N, CL) ||
 2978:             N <- lists:seq(1, 50),
 2979:             CL <- lists:seq(N, N*3),
 2980:             What <- [List, Tuple, Map, Record]
 2981:         ],
 2982:     ok.
 2983: 
 2984: error_info(Config) ->
 2985: 
 2986:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2987:     TmpFile = filename:join(PrivDir,?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2988: 
 2989:     FullDev =
 2990:         fun() ->
 2991:                 case file:read_file_info("/dev/full") of
 2992:                     {ok, _} ->
 2993:                         {ok, Dev} = file:open("/dev/full", [write]),
 2994:                         Dev;
 2995:                     _ ->
 2996:                         dummy_full_device()
 2997:                 end
 2998:         end,
 2999: 
 3000:     UnknownDev = fun dummy_unknown_error_device/0,
 3001: 
 3002:     Latin1Dev = fun() ->
 3003:                         {ok, Dev} = file:open(TmpFile, [read, write, {encoding, latin1}]),
 3004:                         Dev
 3005:                 end,
 3006: 
 3007:     UnicodeDev = fun() ->
 3008:                         {ok, Dev} = file:open(TmpFile, [read, write, {encoding, unicode}]),
 3009:                         Dev
 3010:                 end,
 3011: 
 3012:     DeadDev = spawn(fun() -> ok end),
 3013: 
 3014:     UserDev = fun() -> whereis(user) end,
 3015:     FileDev = FullDev,
 3016:     TestServerDev = fun() -> group_leader() end,
 3017:     ApplicationMasterDev =
 3018:         fun() ->
 3019:                 {_,GL} = process_info(whereis(kernel_sup),group_leader),
 3020:                 GL
 3021:         end,
 3022:     GroupDev = TestServerDev,
 3023:     StandardError = fun() -> whereis(standard_error) end,
 3024: 
 3025:     L = [
 3026:          {put_chars,[DeadDev,"test"],[{1,"terminated"}]},
 3027:          {put_chars,["test"],[{gl,DeadDev},{general,"terminated"}]},
 3028:          {put_chars,[?MODULE,"test"],[{1,"does not exist"}]},
 3029:          {put_chars,[FullDev(),"test"], [{1,"no space left on device"}]},
 3030:          {put_chars,["test"], [{gl,FullDev()},{general,"no space left on device"}]},
 3031:          {put_chars,[Latin1Dev(),"Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1"], [{1,"transcode"}]},
 3032:          {put_chars,[a], [{1,"not valid character data"}]},
 3033:          {put_chars,[UnicodeDev(), <<222>>], [{1,"transcode"}]},
 3034:          {put_chars,[<<1:1>>], [{1,"not valid character data"}]},
 3035:          {put_chars,[UnknownDev(),"test"], [{general,"unknown error: 'Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1'"}]},
 3036:          {put_chars,["test"], [{gl,UnknownDev()},{general,"unknown error: 'Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1'"}]},
 3037:          {put_chars,[self(),"test"],[{1,"the device is not allowed to be the current process"}]},
 3038:          {put_chars,["test"],[{gl,self()},{general,"the device is not allowed to be the current process"}]},
 3039: 
 3040:          {write,[DeadDev,"test"],[{1,"terminated"}]},
 3041:          {write,["test"],[{gl,DeadDev},{general,"terminated"}]},
 3042:          {write,[?MODULE,"test"],[{1,"does not exist"}]},
 3043:          {write,[FullDev(),"test"], [{1,"no space left on device"}]},
 3044:          {write,["test"], [{gl,FullDev()},{general,"no space left on device"}]},
 3045:          {write,[UnknownDev(),"test"], [{general,"unknown error: 'Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1'"}]},
 3046:          {write,["test"], [{gl,UnknownDev()},{general,"unknown error: 'Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1'"}]},
 3047: 
 3048:          {nl,[DeadDev],[{1,"terminated"}]},
 3049:          {nl,[?MODULE],[{1,"does not exist"}]},
 3050:          {nl,[],[{gl,DeadDev},{general,"terminated"}]},
 3051:          {nl,[FullDev()], [{1,"no space left on device"}]},
 3052:          {nl,[], [{gl,FullDev()},{general,"no space left on device"}]},
 3053:          {nl,[UnknownDev()], [{general,"unknown error: 'Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1'"}]},
 3054:          {nl,[], [{gl,UnknownDev()},{general,"unknown error: 'Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1'"}]},
 3055: 
 3056:          [[{Format,[DeadDev,"test",[]],   [{1,"terminated"}]},
 3057:            {Format,["test",[{gl,DeadDev},  {general,"terminated"}]]},
 3058:            {Format,[?MODULE,"test",[]],   [{1,"does not exist"}]},
 3059:            {Format,[FullDev(),"test",[]], [{1,"no space left on device"}]},
 3060:            {Format,["test"], [{gl,FullDev()},{general,"no space left on device"}]},
 3061:            {Format,[standard_io,"test"],  [{1,"wrong number of arguments"},
 3062:                                            {general,"possibly missing argument list"}]},
 3063:            {Format,[UnknownDev(),"test",[]], [{general,"unknown error: 'Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1'"}]},
 3064: 
 3065:            %% Test a latin1 device
 3066:            {Format,[Latin1Dev(), "~ts", [<<"Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1"/utf8>>]],[{1,"transcode"}]},
 3067:            {Format,["~ts", [<<"Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1"/utf8>>]],[{gl,Latin1Dev()},{general,"transcode"}]},
 3068: 
 3069:            %% The format error is reported differently
 3070:            %% depending on the current group_leader.
 3071:            %% The different group leaders we test are:
 3072:            %%  * file_io_server
 3073:            %%  * standard_error
 3074:            %%  * test_server_gl
 3075:            %%  * user
 3076:            %%  * application_master
 3077:            %%  * ssh_cli (TODO)
 3078:            %%  * eunit (TODO)
 3079:            %%  * group (TODO)
 3080:            [ [{Format,[Device(),make_ref(),[]],    [{2,"format string"}]},
 3081:               {Format,[Device(),"~p",make_ref()],  [{3, "not a list"}]},
 3082:               {Format,[make_ref(),[]],[{gl,Device()},{1,"format string"}]},
 3083:               {Format,["~p",make_ref()],[{gl,Device()},{2, "not a list"}]}]
 3084:              || Device <- [UserDev, FileDev, TestServerDev, StandardError,
 3085:                            GroupDev, ApplicationMasterDev]],
 3086: 
 3087:            %% Test number of arguments
 3088:            {Format,["~p",["Sputnik-1","Laika"]],[{1,"wrong number of arguments"}]},
 3089:            {Format,[standard_io, "~p",["Sputnik-1","Laika"]],[{2,"wrong number of arguments"}]},
 3090: 
 3091:            %% Test different formatting strings
 3092:            {Format,["~B",["Sputnik-1"]],[{2,"1 must be of type integer"}]},
 3093:            {Format,[standard_io, "~B",["Sputnik-1"]],[{3,"1 must be of type integer"}]},
 3094:            {Format,["~b",["Sputnik-1"]],[{2,"1 must be of type integer"}]},
 3095:            {Format,["~*b",["Sputnik-1",16]],[{2,"1 must be of type integer"}]},
 3096:            {Format,["~*f",[1.0,1]],[{2,"1 must be of type integer\\n.*2 must be of type float"}]},
 3097:            {Format,["~1.*f",[1.0,1]],[{2,"1 must be of type integer\\n.*2 must be of type float"}]},
 3098:            {Format,["~*.*f",[a,b,c]],[{2,"1 must be of type integer\\n.*"
 3099:                                        "2 must be of type integer\\n.*"
 3100:                                        "3 must be of type float"}]},
 3101:            {Format,["~s",["Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1"]],[{1,"failed to format string"}]},
 3102:            {Format,["~s",[1]],[{2,"1 must be of type string"}]},
 3103:            {Format,["~s~s",[a,1]],[{2,"2 must be of type string"}]},
 3104:            {Format,["~s",[[a]]],[{2,"1 must be of type string"}]}] || Format <- [format,fwrite]]
 3105: 
 3106:         ],
 3107: 
 3108:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(io, lists:flatten(L), [allow_nyi]).
 3109: 
 3110: dummy_full_device() ->
 3111:     dummy_device(enospc).
 3112: dummy_unknown_error_device() ->
 3113:     dummy_device('Ð¡Ð¿ÑÑÐ½Ð¸Ðº-1').
 3114: 
 3115: dummy_device(Error) ->
 3116:     spawn_link(
 3117:       fun() ->
 3118:               receive
 3119:                   {io_request, From, ReplyAs, {put_chars, _Encoding, _Chars}} ->
 3120:                       From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, {error, Error}};
 3121:                   {io_request, From, ReplyAs, {put_chars, _Encoding, M, F, As}} ->
 3122:                       try apply(M, F, As) of
 3123:                           _ ->
 3124:                               From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, {error, Error}}
 3125:                       catch _:_ ->
 3126:                               From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, {error, format}}
 3127:                       end
 3128:               end
 3129:       end).
 3130: 
 3131: %% GH-5053. 'chars_limit' bug.
 3132: otp_17525(_Config) ->
 3133:     L = [{xxxxxxxxx,aaaa},
 3134:          {yyyyyyyyyyyy,1},
 3135:          {eeeeeeeeeeeee,bbbb},
 3136:          {ddddddddd,1111111111},
 3137:          {gggggggggggggggggggg,cccc},
 3138:          {uuuuuuuuuuuu,11}],
 3139:     S = io_lib:format("aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa ~p bbbbbbbbbbb ~p",
 3140:                       ["cccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccc", L],
 3141:                       [{chars_limit, 155}]),
 3142:     "aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa \"cccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccc\" bbbbbbbbbbb [{xxxxxxxxx,\n"
 3143:     "                                                                          aaaa},\n"
 3144:     "                                                                         {yyyyyyyyyyyy,\n"
 3145:     "                                                                          1},\n"
 3146:     "                                                                         {eeeeeeeeeeeee,\n"
 3147:     "                                                                          bbbb},\n"
 3148:     "                                                                         {ddddddddd,\n"
 3149:     "                                                                          1111111111},\n"
 3150:     "                                                                         {...}|...]" =
 3151:     lists:flatten(S),
 3152:     ok.
